snippet: Four gay couples from southern Indiana sued the state on Friday, seeking to force it to recognize same-sex marriages from out of state and issue licenses to same-sex couples.
abstract: Four gay couples from southern Indiana sue the state, seeking to force it to recognize same-sex marriages from out of state and issue licenses to same-sex couples.
lead_paragraph: Four gay couples from southern Indiana sued the state on Friday, seeking to force it to recognize same-sex marriages from out of state and issue licenses to same-sex couples.

headline.main: Indiana: Gay Couples Seek End to Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Gay Couples Seek End to Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
